title: NYPD Cop Pleads Guilty To Pointing His Gun At Two Kids Playing Tag
text:
NYPD Cop Pleads Guilty To Pointing His Gun At Two Kids Playing Tag 
Published By: MTV - Today 
A.M. Click: An NYPD cop lost 30 days of vacation after pleading guilty to pulling his gun on two children playing tag, A Tunisian collective...
